ygData.subject: Re: re to latest stuffs :)
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know....I made 9th level Saturday night....and then I made 10th level last night.  I was casting like a mad man...using my underpowered pet and having
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know....I made 9th level Saturday night....and then I made 10th
level last night. I was casting like a mad man...using my underpowered
pet and having a blast. My skills in magic maxed very quickly except
divination....but you can only locate so many corpses a night. Anyhow.
As far as the SK being any less powerfull....I didn't see that last night.
As a matter of fact...even with the spells we get being chincy at
9th...they still help alot. My pet makes up for damage that I don't
do....kinda like a free swing. Not too mention I don't have to chase down
monsters to either lure them or kill them. Its all about what you want
from your character. SK's take time to mature....they are part
spellcaster and aren't really going to be effective until they really get
a good set of spells and some mana. As many guides have said...they are
3/4 warrior and 1/4 caster...while some choose to dwell only on the
warrior part....the casting is in their nature and should be used to
fullest extent.

Korm
Cazic Thule
